last_episode_to_air.name: The Work Is Never Quite Done
last_episode_to_air.overview: The Melfis make a mad dash across the border to freedom. Fame. Fortune. But the HRTV deal comes with a surprise.

name: Flipped
overview: Chronically underemployed couple Jann and Cricket Melfi are self-proclaimed home renovation “experts” who are more than confident they are television’s next great home design celebrity duo. The clueless pair's dreams of basic cable fame and glory are derailed when they get themselves kidnapped by members of a drug cartel and are forced to renovate their sprawling homes.

episodes.name: An Artistic Vision
episodes.overview: Cricket is fired from a home improvement store. Jann gets the boot from directing a high school play. If ever there was a time to launch their careers as home renovation TV stars, this is it.

episodes.name: Demo Day
episodes.overview: The Melfis tackle their first home renovation project: a shabby shack in the desert. But there’s something in the walls of this fixer-upper. And it’s big.

episodes.name: The Budget
episodes.overview: When Cricket and Jann blow through the pile of found money to renovate their desert dwelling, an unexpected visitor comes through their shiny new door.

episodes.name: Sizzle Reel
episodes.overview: When cartel member Diego shows up looking for his missing money, the Melfis hope a red-hot sizzle reel will come to their rescue.

episodes.name: Exploring New Markets
episodes.overview: Diego makes the Melfis dig their own graves. But will an eleventh-hour moment of renovation inspiration change his mind?

episodes.name: Finding Good Designers
episodes.overview: Diego is thrilled with Jann and Cricket’s remodeling work. So thrilled, in fact, he decides to pawn them off to his boss, Rumualdo.

episodes.name: Putting Clients First
episodes.overview: While Jann and Rumualdo bond over music, Fidelia isn’t impressed with Cricket’s plans for the remodel.

episodes.name: Creative Differences
episodes.overview: The Melfis hope their remodel of Rumualdo’s beach estate will finally set them free. But Diego has a new deal in store for them.

episodes.name: Expanding Your Brand
episodes.overview: When they see auditions are open for a new home renovation TV show, Jann and Cricket plan to create a new sizzle reel right under the cartel’s noses.

episodes.name: Escaping Bad Contracts
episodes.overview: When their audition tape snags them an invite to Los Angeles, Jann and Cricket try to slip away from the cartel unnoticed.

episodes.name: The Work Is Never Quite Done
episodes.overview: The Melfis make a mad dash across the border to freedom. Fame. Fortune. But the HRTV deal comes with a surprise.
